General.Name: Shandong Iron and Steel Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Iron and Steel Company Ltd. provides iron and steel products in China. The company offers medium and heavy plates, hot-rolled coils, cold-rolled coils, H-beams, premium special steels, hot-rolled ribbed steel bars, hot-rolled steel strips, cold-rolled and hot-dip galvanized steels, anchor bars, threaded bars, off-line heat-treated anchor bars, etc. It also offers carbon-bonded steel plates, low-alloy high-strength structural steel plates, grinding steel plates, wear-resistant plates, weather-resistant plates, etc. The company's products are used in automobiles, petroleum, railways, bridges, construction, electric power, transportation, machinery, shipbuilding, light industry, home appliances, and other fields. It also exports its products to Europe, America, Japan, South Korea, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and Hong Kong and other countries and regions. Shandong Iron and Steel Company Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Jinan, China.
